mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over (order by popup_code) AS id ,popup_code as POPP_CODE /* 팝업코드 */ ,popup_name as POPP_NAME /* 팝업명 */ ,popup_content as POPP_CNTT /* 팝업내용 */ ,is_auto_search as AULU_YSNO ,is_search_condition_required as CDRI_YSNO ,searched_grid_data as SERS_GRDC ,popup_xda as POPP_XDAX /* 팝업 SQLMap ID */ ,search_condition_syntax as SECN_SYNX FROM popup WHERE popup_code = #{POPP_CODE}
